Package net.sf.xpontus.controller.actions

This package contains MVC actions of the applications

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CheckXmlFormedAction Action to check if the xml is well-formed
CloseOtherAction Action to close all documents but the selected one(not included for now in the application)
CopyAction Action to copy text
CutAction Action to cut text
ExitAction Action to exit the program
GenerateDtdAction Action to generate a DTD from an opened XML Document
HelpAction Action to open the help window
HTMLTidyAction Action to tidy HTML
InsertCdataAction Action to insert cdata(work in progress)
InsertCommentAction  
OpenAction Action to open one or multiple files
OpenRemoteAction Action to open one or multiple remote files
PasteAction Action to paste text into a document
PrintAction Action to print a document
RedoAction Action to repeat changes in a document
SaveAction Action to save a document
SaveAllAction Action to save all documents
SaveAsAction Action to save a document under another name
SelectAllAction Action to select all the text in an XML document
TabCloseAction Action to close the selected tab of the editor
TabCloseAllAction Action to close all tabs of the editor
UnCommentXMLAction  
UndoAction A class to undo changes
ValidateXmlAction Action to validate an xml document
XMLCommentAction A class to add XML comments to a text selection
XMLDiffAction  
XMLIndentAction Action to indent xml code
 

Package net.sf.xpontus.controller.actions Description

This package contains MVC actions of the applications
